name: growth_mindset
description: Belief that growth and success are achieved through personal effort.

name: effort_driven_success
description: Belief that consistent effort leads to success.

name: learning_capability
description: Belief in the ability to learn new skills and improve.

name: valued_contributions
description: Belief that one's contributions are recognized and appreciated.

name: growth_through_feedback
description: Belief that constructive feedback fosters improvement.

name: adaptability
description: Belief in one's capacity to adapt to changes and challenges.

name: collaborative_success
description: Belief that teamwork enhances performance and outcomes.

name: consistency_for_achievement
description: Belief that consistent effort is key to achieving goals.

name: initiative_for_growth
description: Belief that taking initiative drives personal and professional growth.

name: obstacle_resilience
description: Belief in the ability to overcome challenges with persistence.

name: external_dependency
description: Belief that success depends on external factors beyond one's control.

name: skill_deficiency
description: Belief in a lack of skills required for success.

name: unrecognized_contributions
description: Belief that one's efforts are not valued or acknowledged.

name: mistake_identification
description: Belief that mistakes define one's competence.

name: help_avoidance
description: Belief that seeking help is a sign of weakness.

name: promotion_favoritism
description: Belief that promotions are based on favoritism rather than merit.

name: resource_inadequacy
description: Belief that resources available are insufficient for success.

name: failure_expectation
description: Belief that failure is inevitable regardless of effort.

name: growth_neglect
description: Belief that personal or professional growth is not supported.

name: comparison_syndrome
description: Belief that others are inherently more capable or successful.

name: support_seeking
description: Belief in the importance of seeking help for mental health.

name: self_care_priority
description: Belief that self-care is essential for well-being.

name: resilience
description: Belief in one's ability to recover and thrive despite challenges.

name: mindfulness_practice
description: Belief that mindfulness improves emotional well-being and focus.

name: work_life_balance
description: Belief that balancing work and personal life is achievable.

name: stress_management
description: Belief in the ability to manage stress effectively.

name: rest_importance
description: Belief that rest and relaxation are vital for productivity.

name: health_performance_link
description: Belief that mental health directly impacts performance.

name: expressive_communication
description: Belief that expressing emotions strengthens relationships.

name: restorative_breaks
description: Belief that taking breaks enhances focus and well-being.

name: stress_imbalance
description: Belief that stress is unmanageable and dominates life.

name: over_prioritization_of_work
description: Belief that work must come before personal needs.

name: undeserving_mental_health
description: Belief that one does not deserve mental health support.

name: chronic_stress_belief
description: Belief that stress is unavoidable and persistent.

name: health_career_conflict
description: Belief that focusing on health could harm career prospects.

name: judgment_fear
description: Belief that vulnerability leads to judgment or criticism.

name: comparison_stress
description: Belief that others manage challenges better than oneself.

name: break_avoidance
description: Belief that taking breaks is unproductive.

name: stagnant_mental_health
description: Belief that mental health cannot be improved or changed.
